statement.p: The arch of a bridge forms the top half of an ellipse with a horizontal major axis. The arch is 7 feet high and 20 feet wide.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the ellipse.
How high is the arch at a distance of 8 feet from the peak?

ol.label: a
ol.li: 4.2 ft

statement.p: A doorway is topped by a semi-elliptical arch. The doorway is 230 centimeters high at its highest point and 200 centimeters high at its lowest point. It is 80 centimeters wide.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the ellipse.
How high is the doorway 8 centimeters from the left side?

statement.p: The edge of a sailboat's keel is elliptical in shape, with a major axis of 360 centimeters. The minor axis is 100 centimeters, but part of the ellipse has been cut off parallel to the major axis. This cut edge is 330 centimeters long.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the ellipse.
What is the width of the keel at its widest point? Round your answer to two decimal places.

statement.p: The wing of a World War II British Spitfire is an ellipse whose major axis is 48 feet. The minor axis is 16 feet, but part of the ellipse is cut off parallel to the major axis. This cut edge is 46 feet long.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the ellipse.
How wide is the wing at its center? Round your answer to two decimal places.

statement.p: In a reflecting telescope a parabolic mirror is used to collect light, and the image forms at the focus of the parabola. Suppose you want to build a parabolic mirror that is 72 inches in diameter and 3 inches deep.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the parabola.
How far is the focus from the vertex of the parabola?

ol.label: a
ol.li: 108 in

statement.p: A sonar dish is parbolic in shape, with the receiver located at the focus of the parabola. The dish is 12 inches wide, and the receiver is 12 inches from the vertex of the parabola.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the parabola.
How deep is the dish?

statement.p: Tien-Ying plans to build a parabolic satellite dish. The dish will have a diameter of 60 centimeters and will be 18 centimeters deep. She must place the receiver at the focus of the parabola.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the parabola.
How far is the receiver from the vertex of the parabola?

statement.p: A flashlight has a parabolic mirror to focus a beam of light. The mirror is 8 centimeters in diameter and 4 centimeters deep.

ol.label: a
ol.li: Find an equation for the parabola.
The light bulb must be positioned at the focus of the parabola. How far is the bulb from the vertex of the parabola?

statement.p: The base of the cooling tower is 360 feet below the center of the hyperbola. What is the diameter of the base?

Graph ~x^2-y^2=0. (Hint: Factor the left side of the equation and use the zero-factor principle to write two equations, then graph them.) Describe your graph.

answer.p: The graph is two straight lines through the origin.
